FuncDef: The display clock command displays the current date and time. The display clock command displays the current date and time.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the Universal Time Coordinated (UTC) time.
-

ExtraInfo:
To view the current date and time on a device, run the display clock command. The command output helps you check whether the system time is correct and whether the time needs to be adjusted.
If you have set the daylight saving time using the clock daylight-saving-time command, run the display clock command to view information about the summer time. If you do not set the daylight saving time before using the display clock command, summer time information is not displayed.
